doc:
Michel Blanc https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michel_Blanc 0 Michel Blanc (born 16 April 1952) is a French actor and director. He is noted for his roles of losers and hypochondriacs. He is frequently associated with Le Splendid, which he co-founded, along with Thierry Lhermitte, Josiane Balasko, Christian Clavier, Marie-Anne Chazel and Gérard Jugnot. Michel Blanc has also shown his versatility by appearing in more serious roles, such as the title role in the Patrice Leconte film Monsieur Hire. Michel_Blanc ( born_16_April_1952 ) is a_French_actor_and_director . He is_noted for his_roles of losers_and_hypochondriacs . He is_frequently_associated with Le_Splendid , which he co-founded , along with Thierry_Lhermitte , Josiane_Balasko , Christian_Clavier , Marie-Anne_Chazel and Gérard_Jugnot . Michel_Blanc has_also_shown his_versatility by appearing in more_serious_roles , such_as the_title_role in the_Patrice_Leconte_film_Monsieur_Hire .
